main event: A 12-year-old boy spotted two unidentified objects with blinking red and blue lights over Hadley, Massachusetts in 1966.
interesting points: The objects appeared to move at a fast rate of speed, going southeast to southwest.
When the red light on one of the objects went out, the blue light remained steady.
The witness had seen UFOs before and was certain the objects were not planes, jets, or helicopters.
The objects seemed to disappear and reappear, as if going behind something like a cloud or haze.
The witness described the objects as having a 'slight hum' and changing from a red light to a white light.
sighted object: two unidentified objects with blinking red and blue lights
